trans-unit.source: Represents the textual content of grammar elements defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).
trans-unit.target: Representa o conteúdo textual dos elementos de gramática definida pelo World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [especificação de gramática de reconhecimento de fala (SRGS) versão 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> class represents the text found within a set of SRGS element tags.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> classe representa o texto localizado em um conjunto de marcas de elemento SRGS.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> object is constructed with a <xref:System.String> parameter, a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> object is created with its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> property initialized to the value of that parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objeto for construído com uma <xref:System.String> parâmetro, um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> objeto é criado com seu <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> propriedade inicializada com o valor desse parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> object is then added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A> collection on the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> objeto é adicionado para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A> coleção no <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following C# code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> class to modify the textual contents of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código em c# demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> classe para modificar o conteúdo textual de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The example changes the initial text values of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects (`Large`, `Larger`, and `Largest`) to `Small`, `Medium`, and `Large`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo altera os valores de texto inicial do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objetos (`Large`, `Larger`, e `Largest`) para `Small`, `Medium`, e `Large`, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: The following shows how the modified text of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects would appear as `item` elements in the output XML grammar file.
trans-unit.target: A seguir mostra como o modificou o texto do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objetos apareceria como `item` elementos no arquivo de gramática do XML de saída.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" />.

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> class.
trans-unit.target: Este é o construtor padrão para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> classe.

trans-unit.source: The value used to set the <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text" /> property on the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: O valor usado para definir a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text" /> na instância <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" /> class, specifying the text of the instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" />, especificando o texto da instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text contained within the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" /> class instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto contido dentro da instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" />.

trans-unit.source: The text contained within the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: O texto contido dentro de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" /> instância.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text" /> to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: É feita uma tentativa de definir <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text" /> como <see langword="null" />.
